Today in Donegal, conditions are poor with 8 ft @10s WSW swell but fresh 34 mph S winds making it blown out. Tomorrow, expect a significant improvement as the swell builds to 8 ft @16s W with lighter 12 mph SSE winds, offering clean surf at spots like Rossnowlagh and Tullan Strand. The day after, conditions drop again with 12 ft @13s W swell and fresh 25 mph S winds, leading to poor surf. Best: tomorrow.
